articles.title: Urgent health warning over TikTok's newest trend - Daily Mail
articles.description: The viral videos see people boiling an egg before microwaving it and slicing into it to purposely make it burst. But this explosive new food trend could have some dangerous consequences.
articles.content:
Microwaving boiled eggs could cause life-changing injuries, experts warned today on the back of TikTok's latest trend.

articles.description: A signal sent in error left Voyager 2's antenna tilting the wrong way, severing contact with Earth.
